sources.title: Wild_Brian_Kent
sources.description: Ralph Bellamy finally gets the girl in this one. Wild Brian Kent is a man of wealth who has squandered his life and his money away and never done a bit of productive work in his life . . . until he meets Betty Prentice (Mae Clarke) and helps her save her ranch.

sources.title: Wild Brian Kent (1936) WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Ralph Bellamy, Mae Clarke, Helen Lowell 
 Director: Howard Bretherton

 Polo player Brian stops in a Kansas town and find a girl and her aunt needing money to keep their ranch. He also finds his new real estate partner is the crook trying to do the women out of their ranch.

metadata.Plot: Polo player Brian stops in a Kansas town and find a girl and her aunt needing money to keep their ranch. He also finds his new real estate partner is the crook trying to do the women out of their ranch.
metadata.Writer: Harold Bell Wright, James Gruen, Earle Snell
metadata.Actors: Ralph Bellamy, Mae Clarke, Helen Lowell
